TopicTitle: Plane keeps swinging to the left

Articles.Content:
So over the past few days I've tried assembling a bunch of planes, including a small flying wing and an SSTO superlifter.

Every single one of them has an issue that they will always swing to the left once they get in the air. They also swerve a lot on the runway, and seem to plateau at 2900 metres altitude, but I think those are separate issues.

Many different plane designs all do this, some of them sharing next to nothing between them. I've tried shifting COM both forward and back and that doesn't fix it.

Mods are tweakscale, procedural wings, and OPT spaceplane continued.
